name: How do I disable notifications on AirSend?

video.name: How do I disable notifications on AirSend?

step.name: Preparations
step.text: Open AirSend app on your device

step.name: Disable notifications
step.text: Open Settings and toggle on/off the type of notifications you would like to receive

step.name: Messages after disabling notifications
step.text: You will still receive messages even if you turn off the notifications
